description: This file defines a Loader component using LightningJS framework. It renders animated circles as a loading indicator, encapsulated as a reusable component with props, state, and methods.

classes.name: Loader
classes.description: A LightningJS component that displays animated circles as a loading indicator.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Initiates an interval that toggles the alpha property to create a fade-in and fade-out animation for the loader.
